price: ߌ ߡߴߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߛߋ߲߬ߓߊ߬ ߕߌ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka bi-aṣḥābi al-fīli
